title: Ryan Seacrest and Shayna Taylor split a sweet treat in the street
text:
They've been dating on and off for six years - ever since he first spotted her across a crowded restaurant.

And now Ryan Seacrest and Shayna Taylor are giving their relationship yet another go - with the two spotted sharing a sweet treat in the street in New York on Monday evening.

While the pair stopped short of feeding one another, they were clearly very much an item, with Shayna, 27, snapping pictures of her 44-year-old TV host boyfriend.

Back on: Ryan Seacrest and Shayna Taylor enjoyed a date night on Monday where they were seen indulging in some pastries and taking photos together

With the couple firmly back together, Shayna has been speaking about their relationship to Good Housekeeping.

Shayna told the publication on Tuesday that they first met after Ryan spotted her in a restaurant they were both eating at. She was just 21 at the time, while he was 39.

'I guess he really wanted to talk to me and one of his friends he was sitting with happened to know someone in my group so they were texting to see if I came with anyone in the group, because he was trying to figure out if I was with a guy,' she explained.

She continued to explain that she was completely unaware Ryan was attracted to her until one of her friend's wrote, 'Ryan likes you' on her phone.

'His friends come over and basically sit me in an interview chair and start asking me all these questions to be funny and he came over and took my hairband off my wrist as an intro point, like eighth grade,' she recalled.

'It's now this funny thing we laugh about when he takes my hairband, it's like we reminisce.'

After the two first met in 2013 they soon began dating, splitting the following year. They then rekindled their love, dating for three solid years before splitting in February this year. After a few months apart they decided to give things another try.

Say cheese! Ryan was seen posing for photos with his sweet treat during the night out

Ryan ever-so-briefly touched on his relationship during an interview with Selena Gomez on his radio show last week.

When gushing over how his co-host Sisanie Reategui had her life together with a husband and kids, he said as for himself and other host Tanya Rad, 'I don't know what we have.'

During a September episode of the Live With Kelly And Ryan show, the red carpet reporter's sister bluntly asked him if Shayna would be coming to Thanksgiving dinner.

'The answer is yes,' he said.
description: They've been dating on and off for six years - ever since he first spotted her across a crowded restaurant.
